long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step onto the court in Basketball Court, a fast-paced basketball simulation game that brings the thrill of the game right to your fingertips! Play solo, challenge friends, or compete against players from around the world in exciting multiplayer matchups. With realistic physics, smooth controls, and various game modes like 3-point shootouts, dunk contests, and full-court games, you'll experience all the excitement of basketball. Customize your player, improve your skills, and dominate the leaderboards as you become a basketball legend. Ready to take your shot? The court is waiting!
